tool_description:
AirNav RadarBox On Demand API enables you to quickly and easily integrate real-time, scheduled or historical flight data into your solutions. Available fields include flight number, scheduled, estimated and actual departure and arrival times, flight parameters such as speed and altitude, aircraft registration/tail-number.

For any questions, requests or suggestions contact our support.
name: Radarbox On-Demand
title: Radarbox On-Demand

api_list.name: geosearch
api_list.description: Use this endpoint if you are interested in knowing which flights have flown over a particular geographical area at a given point in time

api_list.name: search
api_list.description: Use this endpoint for general flight searches - past, present or future (scheduled) - based on departure/arrival location or individual flights and tail numbers. The search always needs to be restricted by date (either departure, arrival or both).

api_list.name: aircraftPosition
api_list.description: Use this endpoint if your goal is to get real time information for live flights, either if you are looking for a specific geographical location or particular aircraft/airline/airport.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://radarbox-on-demand.p.rapidapi.com/flights/live"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "radarbox-on-demand.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://radarbox-on-demand.p.rapidapi.com/flights/live"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "radarbox-on-demand.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
